thread.title: Kim Kardashian 'Livid' After Being Shot Down At Several Post Oscar Bashes
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian 'Livid' After Being Shot Down At Several Post Oscar Bashes

author: James Vituscka
title: Kim Kardashian 'Livid' After Being Shot Down At Several Post Oscar Bashes
text:
PHOTOS: Pregnant Kim Kardashian At Elton John’s Oscars Party 
Instead, the family spent the night in. 
“They watched the show at home,” the source revealed. “Kim is often reminded that she is not a real star when she goes to any of these things, but she and Kanye really wanted to have a fun night out.” 
Meanwhile, momager Kris Jenner’s Oscars evening wasn’t much better. 
Though she covered the red carpet for E!, the reality matriarch made a major faux pas by not knowing anything about the stars’ ACLU blue ribbons — and as Radar reported, she threw a fit off-camera. 
“Kris accused producers of trying to sabotage her,” source said. “She will likely not be asked to work the pre-show again!” 
Do you think that Kim Kardashian should have been invited to the Oscar parties? Tell us your thoughts below.
